Array.Value: Farmer's Breakfast
A meal that farmers eat to start a vigorous day. Sometimes, it's necessary to experience a simple meal.
Rice Ball of Hardship
A rice ball that helped people survive during tough times. It's only seasoned with salt, just enough to get through the day.
Bone Soup
A broth that has been simmered for a long time. It's hot, but once you take a sip, you can't help but exclaim.
Meatballs
A delicious dish made by shaping and cooking meat. While eating, you might not be sure if it's a snack or a meal, but it's tasty.
Crab Gratin
A dish made by mixing hermit crab meat with cheese and baking it in a kiln. The soft texture is quite appealing.
Berry Shake
A drink made by mixing berries and milk. It feels like it might help with digestion.
Flower Beer
A beer brewed with flowers to give it a fragrant aroma. The blend of grains and floral scents makes it even more delicious.
Cookie
A cookie made by mixing grain flour with honey and baking it until crispy. Sweet and perfect as a light snack.
Berry Tart
A tart made by simmering berries and baking them with grain flour. The sweet and tangy berry flavor spreads in your mouth.
Armadillo Fried Rice
A savory fried rice made by stir-frying meat and grains, served in an armadillo shell.
Sushi
A dish made by placing raw fish on vinegared rice. Both fresh fish and slightly aged fish bring out their unique flavors.
Beondegi
Packed with nutrition! A protein bomb! Full of minerals! A superfood that takes care of the citizens' health.
Scorpion Tanghulu
A sweet dish made by gathering scorpion tails, marinating them in syrup, and letting them harden. Tasty, but eating too much can harm your teeth.
Commoner's Lunch
A typical meal that commoners eat. It would be even more delightful if there were a piece of meat here.
Donkatsu
Meat that is pounded thin, coated in batter, and fried. The taste has improved along with the portion size.
Blazing Storm Steamed Monkfish
There has never been a spiciness like this. Is this poison or a dish? A spectacle of flavor and painâ€”spicy steamed monkfish.
Pudding
A soft and bouncy sweet dessert. Just one spoonful fills your mouth with sweetness.
Pizza
A flat dish made with grain dough topped with sauce, cheese, and meat. The person who invented this is undoubtedly a genius.
Hero's Nachos
A snack famous for being eaten by the hero with black wings when bored. When there's nothing to do, just bring some nachos.
Seafood Pasta
A pasta rich in flavor and taste, made with hermit crab and fish.
Fantasy Cake
A unique cake with a popping purple flavor made using touch-me-not flowers.
Steamed Frog with Flowers
A tender dish where a frog is infused with the fragrance of flowers and slowly braised in fruit wine.
Gelato
A sweet dessert with a chewy texture, topped with various toppings that make you feel like you're walking on clouds.
Joy Flower Sunrise
A legendary cocktail said to wake one up at sunrise when drunk. A taste that rises with fun, like the early morning sun.
Oilfall Cheese Steak
A steak cooked as if deep-fried in oil, then topped with melted cheese. Is your blood vessel okay?
Escargot
A unique dish made by cooking snails. The chewy texture and aromatic flavor fill your mouth.
Vin Chaud
A warm beverage made by simmering wine with fruits and sugar. It warms you up even in cold weather.
